text: Frank DuVal Hargrove, Sr. (January 26, 1927 â€“ October 16, 2021) was an American Republican politician. From 1982 to 2010, he was a member of the Virginia House of Delegates. Hargrove was born in Hanover County, Virginia. Hargrove died on October 16, 2021 in Ashland, Virginia at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Frank Hargrove
